title: Quebec License Plates post-1984
content:
Apparently, there's this distinct style of plate typeface Québec has come up with.

Some examples at these URLs:

[http://www.15q.net/qc.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419105407/http:/www.15q.net/qc.html "http://www.15q.net/qc.html")

[http://www.plateshack.com/quebec/quebec.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419105407/http:/www.plateshack.com/quebec/quebec.html "http://www.plateshack.com/quebec/quebec.html")

[http://www.plateshack.com/y2k/Quebec/quy2k.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419105407/http:/www.plateshack.com/y2k/Quebec/quy2k.html "http://www.plateshack.com/y2k/Quebec/quy2k.html")
author: DEWLine

comments.content: They have changed the number design, for instance, over time. Is there a year or range of years that we should be looking at?
